SEARCH
Package com.example

Class Gateway

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
com.example.Gateway
All Implemented Interfaces:
GatewayInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class Gateway extends UnicastRemoteObject implements GatewayInterface
This class is responsible for the Gateway that will communicate with the barrels and the clients.
See Also:
